summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Discussion Board application. All backend APIs working correctly (100% success rate). Frontend UI functional with successful login, navigation, topic creation, and admin features. Minor issues with topic display and logout flow identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Topic cards not displaying on topics page despite topics being created

integration_issues.issue: Topics created via API and UI not appearing in topics list view

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix topic listing display issue - topics are being created successfully but not appearing in the topics page list view. Check TopicsPage component data fetching and rendering logic.
